segments.text: There’s a certain charm to this kitchen scene, but it feels like a ticking time bomb to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing that stool, and my heart races as I see it wobble beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? It would be such a disaster, yet he looks so carefree.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing close by, patiently raising her hand, as if to say, 'Me too!'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eagerness is precious, but it makes everything feel even riskier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can’t they just wait for the woman to notice them instead of sneaking these treats?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies just sitting there, so enticing and delicious, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR
